function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate mobility parameters due to lack of real origin-destination data","Impact":"May lead to inaccurate transmission dynamics and flawed simulation results","Mitigation":"Calibrate mobility parameters with real origin-destination data where available","Technologies":"Data calibration tools, simulation validation algorithms","People":"Researchers, public health organizations","Owner":"Research groups, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Homogeneous mixing assumptions in large-scale epidemiological models","Impact":"May overestimate the size of epidemics and miscalculate their timing, leading to biased results","Mitigation":"Incorporate small-scale heterogeneity in epidemiological simulations to more accurately represent neighborhood-level processes","Technologies":"Agent-based models, neighborhood-level simulation frameworks","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limited accessibility of massive mobility datasets","Impact":"Restricts the ability for many research groups and public health organizations to analyze transmission dynamics in cities","Mitigation":"Encourage open access to mobility datasets or develop alternative methods for inferring mobility patterns","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, alternative data inference techniques","People":"Research groups, public health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, government bodies"}]}
